title: Bud Anderson
description:
Kirk Minihane gives his review and grade for Top Gun: Maverick (00:05:00). ADVANCED WARNING ON POSSIBLE SPOILERS. Norm MacDonald's new stand up special was loved by Mike and hated by Kirk (00:14:00). Jayson Tatum texts Kobe Bryant and then posts it on Instagram (00:30:00). Mike sends Gerry Callahan a message over Gabe Kapler boycotting the National Anthem (00:46:00). ESPN Arkansas' Derek Ruschin is taking some time off after calling Arkansas' catcher a 'stupid ass' and a "disgrace" (01:07:00). Justin's colleagues at the golf course are pretty impressed with him & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
